alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 9:46PM PST until December 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches below 2500 feet, 6 to 10 inches between 2500 and 3500 feet, and 1 to 2 feet above 3500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit https://www.tripcheck.com
